author: .austingriffith
content: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6780 nicely sums it up as "The SELFDESTRUCT opcode requires large changes to the state of an account, in particular removing all code and storage. This will not be possible in the future with Verkle trees: Each account will be stored in many different account keys, which will not be obviously connected to the root account."
